title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal
descriptions:
Introducing the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat! This high-quality yoga mat is perfect for all your fitness and exercise needs. 

With dimensions of 72 inches in length and 24 inches in width, this mat provides ample space for you to stretch and move comfortably. The thickness of 2/5 inch offers extra cushioning and support, ensuring a comfortable practice every time. 

Made from durable NBR foam, this mat is built to last. It is designed in a beautiful teal color, adding a touch of style to your workout routine. Weighing only 3.11 pounds, it is lightweight and easy to carry around.

The Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat is suitable for a variety of exercises, including yoga, Pilates, and floor exercises. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced practitioner, this mat will meet your needs.

Featuring an extra-thick construction, this mat provides superior comfort and joint protection. The soft cushioning allows you to hold poses and perform exercises with ease. Plus, it includes a convenient carrier strap, making it easy to transport and store.

Invest in your fitness journey with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat. Experience the comfort, durability, and versatility that this mat has to offer. Get yours today and elevate your fitness routine to new heights!
